title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 103.1 - Orders designating department of correctional services receiving institutions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 103.1 - Orders designating department of correctional services receiving institutions

State Regulations

Persons who are committed, transferred, certified to or
placed in the care or custody of the Department of Correctional Services are to
be delivered to the institutions designated in sections
103.5
through
103.45
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
103.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
